Class Market

java.lang.Object
Market
public class Market extends Object
The Market object. Responsible for storing all companies and enabling actions related to finding company data Allows for market to be stopped/started for Traders, as well as allows for time manipulation of the Market.

  • Constructor Details

    • Market

      public Market(Hashtable<String,Company> companies, LocalDate startDate)
      Instantiates a new Market. Trading is disabled by default and must be started using start() or toggleActive().
      Parameters:
      companies - Hashtable of all companies part of the market.
      startDate - Date from which trading will begin.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Start the Market and allow trading.

    • getControlledTraders

      public ArrayList<Trader> getControlledTraders()
      Gets current list of traders being controlled by the market.
      Returns:
      Populated list of traders.

    • addTrader

      public void addTrader(Trader trader)
      Adds a trader to the list of controlledTraders, which allow for trading to be automated using each trader's run() method.
      Parameters:
      trader - Trader to be controlled.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stop the Market and stop trading.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset Market back to initial startDate.

    • getCompanies

      public Hashtable<String,Company> getCompanies()
      Gets all companies.
      Returns:
      Hashtable indexed by company ticker.

    • findCompany

      public Company findCompany(String ticker)
      Find company.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Company ticker.
      Returns:
      Company object corresponding with ticker.

    • findLatestDailyData

      public DailyData findLatestDailyData(String ticker)
      Find latest DailyData for a company.
      Parameters:
      ticker - Company ticker.
      Returns:
      Today's DailyData.

    • nextDay

      public void nextDay()
      Advance Market by a day.

    • addDays

      public void addDays(int days)
      Advance Market by a set amount of days.
      Parameters:
      days - Days to advance Market.

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Whether the Market is currently active
      Returns:
      True if Market is active.

    • toggleActive

      public void toggleActive()
      Toggle Market state between active/inactive.

    • getCurrentDate

      public LocalDate getCurrentDate()
      Gets current Market date.
      Returns:
      Current date.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Advanced toString() override that outputs information in a human-readable format.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String containing all companies current stock price, and/or market status.
